api pasal gos giya dina patan wada karanne wada karanna pawa niyamitha kramaweda harahaya..pas wennata niyamitha wibhaga list eka daruwa eka wasarata yanakota pawa sithata athulu kota hamaraya..ape kramaya thula siyayata anu nawayakatath wada iganima karanne athulathin ena balayakata ho unanduwakata nowe pitathin patawana ilakkayak wetha thama aspaya mehawima magini...ee thula athi aakarshaniyama de nam lamayi samada dekata namena yunit ekak wimayi...guruwarun pothapatha kiyana de siyayata siyayak niwaradiya..guruwaru ketharam pacha igannuwath nuganwa sitiyath owunta garu kala yuthuya..kisidu aakarayakata lamunta pasalata ho kisidu deyakata erehi wima nomaga yamaki...mese iganim nimakota eliyata ena boho dena rakiyawak thanagannata adahas aththo noweth...rakiya wekansiyak kohen ho kadapath wenathuru balasitina pirisaki...lamunta swadhina adahas kiya deyak nothibiya yuthu bawa apa wisin niyama karanu labana ratawa wisin girakramayata lamunta ennath kara atha..
